alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 1:24PM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 2000 feet. Total accumulations of 4 to 7, with higher amounts between Grangeville and White Bird Grade. For areas below 2000 feet, total accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
